name: Ihram
description: Entering into the state of ihram by performing the intention and wearing forbidden clothes.
details: Make the intention to perform Hajj.
Wear forbidden clothing: two white robes for men and simple white clothing for women.

name: tawaf
description: Performing Tawaf, which includes circumambulating the Kaaba seven times.
details: Start from the Black Stone and go in the counterclockwise direction.
Complete seven circuits around the Kaaba.
Reciting supplications and prayers during Tawaf

name: quest
description: Performing the sa'y between Safa and Marwa seven times.
details: Start from Safa and move towards Marwa.
He walked quickly between Safa and Marwa, on a specific path.
Complete seven cycles of saâ€™i, and end at Al-Marwah.
Reciting supplications and prayers during the Sa'y

name: Mona
description: Stay in Mina and spend the day and night there.
details: Arrival to Mina on the eighth day of Dhu al-Hijjah.
Performing the five daily prayers in Mina.
Spend the night in Mina and pray to God.

name: Arafa
description: Standing in Arafat and participating in worship and supplication.
details: Arrival to Arafat on the ninth of Dhul-Hijjah before noon.
Performing the noon and afternoon prayers together and shortening them.
Standing in Arafat, seeking forgiveness and supplication.
Listening to the Imam's sermon.
Continue praying until sunset.

name: Muzdalifah
description: Spending the night in Muzdalifah and collecting pebbles to stone the Jamarat.
details: Arrival to Muzdalifah after sunset from Arafat.
Collecting pebbles to throw stones at Jamarat.
Performing the Maghrib and Isha prayers together and shortening them.
Spend the night in Muzdalifah and remember God,

name: Throwing at Jamarat
description: Performing the Tawaf of Jamarat at the Great Aqaba, the Middle Aqaba, and the Lesser Aqaba in Mina.
details: Throwing at Jamrat al-Kubra with seven pebbles
Supplication and seeking forgiveness while throwing stones.
Go to the middle Aqaba and throw seven pebbles at it.
Go to the Minor Aqaba and throw seven pebbles at it.
